Class.name: Report.INIssueLine
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INIssueLine.Company as INIssueLine_Company,SQLUser.INIssue.Company as INIssue_Company,SQLUser.INIssueLine.IssueNumber,SQLUser.INIssueLine.LineNumber,SQLUser.INIssueLine.Status,SQLUser.INIssueLine.Demand as Supply,SQLUser.INIssueLine.ToStorage,SQLUser.INIssueLine.FromStorage,SQLUser.INIssueLine.QtyRequired,SQLUser.INIssueLine.QtyIssued,SQLUser.INIssueLine.Reference,SQLUser.INIssueLine.Item,SQLUser.INIssueLine.Unit,SQLUser.WWW101.ParameterDescription,SQLUser.WWW101.Language1,SQLUser.WWW101.SearchItem,SQLUser.INIssue.IssueNumber as HeaderIssueNumber,SQLUser.INIssue.Status as HeaderStatus,SQLUser.INIssue.ToLocn,SQLUser.INIssue.FromLocn,SQLUser.INIssue.DemandType,SQLUser.INIssue.Reference as HeaderReference,SQLUser.INIssueLine.ItemName from SQLUser.INIssueLine,SQLUser.WWW101,SQLUser.INIssue where (WWW101.ParameterDescription = 'EINHEIT') and (WWW101.SearchItem = INIssueLine.Unit) and (INIssue.IssueNumber = INIssueLine.IssueNumber) and (INIssue.Company = INIssueLine.Company)
